(row = 19, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 19, col = 1)

Given the current position of the avatar at (19, 1) and the last position being the same, it indicates that I didn't move with the last action. 

Upon analyzing the current game state, we observe the following important factors:

- There are several resources nearby:
  - Gold at (17, 6) and (18, 19).
  - A key at (19, 16).
- The exit is located at (20, 20).
- My health is at 10 HP, which is good as I haven't encountered any hazards yet.

Since there are no direct hazards or walls to my immediate movement in the left or right direction, I can take actions that can improve my resource collection.

Since the last position has not changed, I need to make the first move after rotation. Since I am facing down, I can move to the right to collect the key at (19, 16).

``` Action:2 ```

I expect that moving right will get me closer to the key while maintaining my health, which is in line with the strategy of resource collection and health management.
